Major Events by Presidential Term: FDR's New Deal increased both GDP and debt.
FDR increased spending and raised taxes.
Korean War boosted growth and debt.
Nixon ended gold standard. OPEC oil embargo.
Bank bailout cost $250 b. ARRA added $241.9 b.
ARRA added $400 b. Payroll tax holiday ended. Obama Tax cuts. ACA. Simpson-Bowles.
Debt crisis. Recession and tax cuts reduced revenue.
War cost $309 billion. QE ended. Debt ceiling crisis.
